Abstrak:
Cultural urban regeneration, is it myth or reality? The information below, aims to analyze the trend of urban regeneration through culture and if it can be used in the case of cities in Romania.First, the theoretical aspects with  regard  tourban  regeneration  through  culture  are  presentedin  order  to 
develop a broader vision upon the topic.Second, a case study of the Muzeul ??rii  Cri?ului    building,  in  Oradea    is  consideredin  relation  to  urban regeneration  and  culture.Cultural  urban regeneration became  an  important aspect through-out the years to be considered inthe decision-making process 
as it influences thequality of life of the citizens
.
Kata Kunci: culture,   urban   conservation,   industrial,   cultural   heritage,  museum
Sumber: Revista Român? de Geografie Politic?, Year  XX , no. 1 ,  May  2018 , pp. 36 -  40
